comments: Adebayo (MIA) brings his arms down from a vertical position and makes contact with Anthony's (POR) arm that affects his shot near the rim.
Robinson (MIA) makes contact with Kanter's (POR) arm that affects his shot near the rim.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in McCollum's (POR) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Kanter (POR) makes contact with the ball and with the part of Nunn's (MIA) hand that is on the ball as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Covington (MIA) is already in Ariza's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Anthony's (POR) jump shot attempt.
Kanter (POR) and Herro (MIA) briefly engage and disengage during rebounding.
Covington (POR) is already in Ariza's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Nunn (MIA) is moving alongside McCollum's (POR) path in a legal guarding position, and the marginal contact is caused by McCollum.
Adebayo (MIA) avoids making contact with Kanter's (POR) arm as he defends the shot near the rim.
Robinson (MIA) is already in Covington's (POR) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Adebayo (MIA) is already in McCollum's (POR) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Anthony (POR) legally contests Adebayo's (MIA) shot attempt.
McCollum (POR) avoids making contact with Adebayo's (MIA) arm as he defends the shot attempt.
Covington (POR) is already in Nunn's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
McCollum (POR) is bracing for the contact from Robinson (MIA) and he releases away from the contact.
Robinson (MIA) is moving alongside McCollum's (POR) path and maintains a legal guarding position as he defends the drive.
Robinson (MIA) jumps A to B into Jones Jr.'s (POR) body and affects his shot near the rim.
Nunn (MIA) is already in Jones Jr.'s (POR) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Adebayo (MIA) extends his arm and marginal contact occurs with Jones Jr.'s (POR) side during the drive to the basket.
Jones Jr. (POR) legally contests Adebayo's (MIA) shot near the rim.
Lillard (POR) releases away from the contact with Ariza (MIA) on the perimeter.
Ariza (MIA) makes contact to Lillard's (POR) arm that affects his jump shot attempt.  After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of a three-point shot is confirmed.
